actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To make certain technical corrections in the Solar, Wind, Waste, and Geothermal Power Production Incentives Act of 1990.
short_title: Solar, Wind, Waste, and Geothermal Power Production Incentives Technical Amendments Act of 1991

summary.text: Solar, Wind, Waste, and Geothermal Power Production Incentives Technical Amendments Act of 1991 - Makes technical amendments to the Federal Power Act and the Solar, Wind, Waste, and Geothermal Power Production Incentives Act of 1990 to remove the size limitations placed upon solar, wind, and geothermal facilities of 80 megawatts or less to make them eligible for regulatory benefits under the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978.

titles.title: Solar, Wind, Waste, and Geothermal Power Production Incentives Technical Amendments Act of 1991
To make certain technical corrections in the Solar, Wind, Waste, and Geothermal Power Production Incentives Act of 1990.
